## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (fabcfd39cc4468aaddf92dd77dc548149fa6f7f8d09de7dc5af550bf8fbc2b81)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@hyperion-util/script-loader' @ 77.77.79 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
